original_text:
Book of Time
Un piacevole ritorno
Alcune slot vengono ricordate negli anni per la grafica, altre per il gameplay, altre ancora per l’alto RTP. Ci sono poi quelle che rimangono impresse nella memoria per i personaggi memorabili, come accade con Book of Time, la nuova slot di Hawksaw Gaming con protagonista Canny the Can, la simpatica lattina gialla già vista in due precedenti giochi online.
Anche in questo caso la grafica attira subito l’attenzione del giocatore, con il nostro simpatico amico che si trova alla destra della griglia a controllare le nostre giocate. Lo stile è quello dei fumetti, intuibile anche dal font con cui sono scritte le parole che ci avvisano l’importo delle nostre vincite o il tipo di Bonus attivato.
Lo sfondo è un bosco, con la griglia incorniciata nel legno e i tasti, ben disposti in basso, non occupano molto spazio. I colori sono volutamente sbiaditi, dando al gioco un gusto retrò, caratteristica accentuata anche dalla musica che accompagna le nostre giocate che sembra uscita da un vecchio film anni Cinquanta.
 
Un ottimo RTP per vincite di livello
La griglia di gioco ha cinque rulli e quattro righe, le linee di pagamento fisse sono 20. Le scommesse di Book of Time partono da un minimo di 0,10 €, ma possono essere innalzate a piacimento. La vincita massima è di 10.000 volte la puntata.
Oltre ai giri automatici, troviamo anche due tipi di acceleratori dei rulli. Turbo e Super Turbo.
La volatilità è alta, il colore RTP è invece pari al 96,13%.
 
Bonus diversi per vincite favolose
Prima di conoscere i vari Bonus di questa slot, diamo un’occhiata ai simboli del gioco base. Come in quasi tutti i giochi, anche qui troviamo le carte da gioco buone per una scala reale, quindi dal dieci all’asso, simboli che hanno un valore abbastanza basso. A seguire troviamo le bacchette magiche, il cappello da strega, il pugnale, la mano e il topolino. ogni simboli
Il libro è un simbolo Wild/Scatter: sostituisce tutti i simboli paganti e se compare almeno tre volte durante la stessa giocata, regala da 10 a 20 giri gratuiti. Prima che parta il gioco Bonus viene selezionato un simbolo speciale che se atterrano su almeno tre rullo, si espandono.
L’orologio è un altro simbolo Scatter e assegna dieci giri gratuiti. Sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 vedremo degli orologi, le cui lancette variano a ogni giro. In base all’ora segnata, ci regaleranno un moltiplicatore. Inoltre, ogni simbolo orologio che atterra sui rulli ricoprirà la funzione di Wild, espandendosi su tutto il rullo.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Time
A pleasant return
Some slots are remembered over the years for their graphics, others for their gameplay, and still others for their high RTP. Then there are those that remain ingrained in memory for their memorable characters, as is the case with Book of Time, the new slot by Hawksaw Gaming featuring Canny the Can, the likable yellow can already seen in two previous online games. 

Once again, the graphics immediately catch the player's attention, with our friendly friend positioned to the right of the grid, monitoring our spins. The style is that of comics, as evidenced by the font used to display information such as our winnings or the type of Bonus activated. 

The background is a forest, with the grid framed in wood and the buttons, well positioned at the bottom, not taking up much space. The intentionally muted colors give the game a retro feel, accentuated by the music that accompanies our spins, reminiscent of an old 1950s film.

Excellent RTP for high-level winnings
The game grid has five reels and four rows, with fixed paylines totaling 20. Book of Time bets start at a minimum of €0.10 but can be raised at will. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet. 

In addition to automatic spins, we also find two types of reel accelerators: Turbo and Super Turbo. The volatility is high, while the RTP is 96.13%.

Different bonuses for fabulous winnings
Before diving into the various bonuses within this slot, let's take a look at the base game symbols. As in almost all games, we find playing cards good for a Royal Flush, from ten to ace, and symbols with a relatively low value. Following these are magic wands, witch hats, daggers, hands, and mice.

The book is a Wild/Scatter symbol, replacing all paying symbols. If it appears at least three times during the same spin, it awards 10 to 20 free spins. Before the Bonus game starts, a special symbol is selected, which, if it lands on at least three reels, expands. 

The clock is another Scatter symbol and awards ten free spins. On reels 2, 3, and 4, we will see clocks whose hands vary with each spin, awarding multipliers based on the hour indicated. In addition, every clock symbol that lands on the reels will act as a Wild, expanding across the entire reel.

message.content:
Book of Time
A pleasant return
Some slots are remembered over the years for their graphics, others for their gameplay, and still others for their high RTP. Then there are those that remain ingrained in memory for their memorable characters, as is the case with Book of Time, the new slot by Hawksaw Gaming featuring Canny the Can, the likable yellow can already seen in two previous online games. 

Once again, the graphics immediately catch the player's attention, with our friendly friend positioned to the right of the grid, monitoring our spins. The style is that of comics, as evidenced by the font used to display information such as our winnings or the type of Bonus activated. 

The background is a forest, with the grid framed in wood and the buttons, well positioned at the bottom, not taking up much space. The intentionally muted colors give the game a retro feel, accentuated by the music that accompanies our spins, reminiscent of an old 1950s film.

Excellent RTP for high-level winnings
The game grid has five reels and four rows, with fixed paylines totaling 20. Book of Time bets start at a minimum of €0.10 but can be raised at will. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet. 

In addition to automatic spins, we also find two types of reel accelerators: Turbo and Super Turbo. The volatility is high, while the RTP is 96.13%.

Different bonuses for fabulous winnings
Before diving into the various bonuses within this slot, let's take a look at the base game symbols. As in almost all games, we find playing cards good for a Royal Flush, from ten to ace, and symbols with a relatively low value. Following these are magic wands, witch hats, daggers, hands, and mice.

The book is a Wild/Scatter symbol, replacing all paying symbols. If it appears at least three times during the same spin, it awards 10 to 20 free spins. Before the Bonus game starts, a special symbol is selected, which, if it lands on at least three reels, expands. 

The clock is another Scatter symbol and awards ten free spins. On reels 2, 3, and 4, we will see clocks whose hands vary with each spin, awarding multipliers based on the hour indicated. In addition, every clock symbol that lands on the reels will act as a Wild, expanding across the entire reel.

message.content:
Book of Time
A Pleasant Return
Some slot games are remembered over the years for their graphics, others for their gameplay, and still others for their high RTP. Then there are those that leave a lasting impression on the memory due to their memorable characters, as is the case with Book of Time, the new slot game from Hawksaw Gaming featuring Canny the Can, the cheerful yellow can previously seen in two other online games.
In this case, the graphics immediately capture the player's attention, with our friendly companion located on the right-hand side of the grid controlling our plays. The style is that of comic books, as can be seen from the font used to write the words that inform us of the amount of our winnings or the type of bonus activated.
The background is a forest, with the grid framed in wood and the buttons, well arranged at the bottom, not taking up too much space. The colors are intentionally faded, giving the game a retro taste, a feature accentuated by the music that accompanies our plays, which seems to come from an old film from the fifties.

A Great RTP for High-Level Winnings
The game grid has five reels and four rows, with 20 fixed paylines. Book of Time bets start at a minimum of €0.10 but can be increased at will. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet amount.
In addition to automatic spins, we also find two types of reel accelerators: Turbo and Super Turbo.
The volatility is high, but the RTP is 96.13%.

Different Bonuses for Fabulous Wins
Before we get into the various bonuses of this slot, let's take a look at the symbols of the base game. As in almost all games, here too we find playing cards good for a royal flush, from ten to ace, symbols that have a fairly low value. Following these, we find magic wands, witch hats, daggers, hands, and mice, each with its own symbol.
The book is a Wild/Scatter symbol, replacing all paying symbols, and if it appears at least three times during the same game, it awards from 10 to 20 free spins. Before the bonus game starts, a special symbol is selected that, if it lands on at least three reels, expands.
The clock is another Scatter symbol and awards ten free spins. On reels 2, 3, and 4, we will see clocks, whose hands change with each spin. Depending on the time shown, they will give us a multiplier. Moreover, each clock symbol that lands on the reels will cover the function of a Wild, expanding over the entire reel.

The game grid has five reels, four rows, and 20 fixed paylines, with a high volatility and an RTP of 96.13%. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet amount, and players can use Turbo and Super Turbo to accelerate the reels. The game features different bonuses, such as the Wild/Scatter symbol book that awards from 10 to 20 free spins and a special expanding symbol, and the Scatter symbol clock that awards ten free spins and a multiplier depending on the time shown by the clocks on reels 2, 3, and 4.

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Game mechanics and statistics

Review: Book of Time
A Pleasant Return
Some slot games are remembered over the years for their graphics, others for their gameplay, and still others for their high RTP. Then there are those that leave a lasting impression on the memory due to their memorable characters, as is the case with Book of Time, the new slot game from Hawksaw Gaming featuring Canny the Can, the cheerful yellow can previously seen in two other online games.
In this case, the graphics immediately capture the player's attention, with our friendly companion located on the right-hand side of the grid controlling our plays. The style is that of comic books, as can be seen from the font used to write the words that inform us of the amount of our winnings or the type of bonus activated.
The background is a forest, with the grid framed in wood and the buttons, well arranged at the bottom, not taking up too much space. The colors are intentionally faded, giving the game a retro taste, a feature accentuated by the music that accompanies our plays, which seems to come from an old film from the fifties.

A Great RTP for High-Level Winnings
The game grid has five reels and four rows, with 20 fixed paylines. Book of Time bets start at a minimum of €0.10 but can be increased at will. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet amount.
In addition to automatic spins, we also find two types of reel accelerators: Turbo and Super Turbo.
The volatility is high, but the RTP is 96.13%.

Different Bonuses for Fabulous Wins
Before we get into the various bonuses of this slot, let's take a look at the symbols of the base game. As in almost all games, here too we find playing cards good for a royal flush, from ten to ace, symbols that have a fairly low value. Following these, we find magic wands, witch hats, daggers, hands, and mice, each with its own symbol.
The book is a Wild/Scatter symbol, replacing all paying symbols, and if it appears at least three times during the same game, it awards from 10 to 20 free spins. Before the bonus game starts, a special symbol is selected that, if it lands on at least three reels, expands.
The clock is another Scatter symbol and awards ten free spins. On reels 2, 3, and 4, we will see clocks, whose hands change with each spin. Depending on the time shown, they will give us a multiplier. Moreover, each clock symbol that lands on the reels will cover the function of a Wild, expanding over the entire reel.

response.headline: The Timeless Features of Book of Time
response.content:
If you're a fan of slot games, you'll want to check out Book of Time from Hawksaw Gaming. This game features everyone's favorite cheerful yellow can, Canny the Can, who has made appearances in two other online games. In Book of Time, Canny is on a quest to travel through time to discover a treasure trove of riches. Are you ready to join him?

The game grid has five reels and four rows, with an impressive 20 fixed paylines to increase your chances of winning big. And with a minimum bet of just €0.10, there's no need to break the bank to get started. But if you're feeling lucky, you can increase your bet to try to hit the jackpot.

But that's not all! Book of Time also offers two types of reel accelerators for those wanting to up the ante: the Turbo and Super Turbo features. And for those who prefer to sit back and relax, automatic spins are also available. Keep in mind, though, that the game's high volatility means that the payouts may not be as frequent, but when they do come, they can be incredibly generous. The game's RTP (Return to Player) is set at a solid 96.13%, which means that the odds are in your favor overall.

All in all, Book of Time is a thrilling and exciting game for those who love slot games. With Canny the Can at your side, the possibilities of traveling through time and winning big are endless. So place your bets, cross your fingers, and let's go on this adventure together!

response.headline: Graphics and Design
response.content:
Book of Time's graphics are striking and immediately capture the player's attention. They're so clear and detailed that you'll feel like you're really living the story with our friendly companion. And let's be honest, he looks like he knows how to party. Move aside, Indiana Jones, there's a new adventurer in town.

The style of the game reminds me of comic books, and our protagonist is located on the right-hand side of the screen, controlling your every move. He's like a knight in shining armor, except he wears a fedora instead of a helmet. The background is a lush forest, and the grid is framed in wood, which complements the game's retro feel. The buttons are well arranged at the bottom, so you won't hit the wrong one in the heat of the moment. The colors aren't too bright, which is good, considering you might be playing through the night.

And the music that accompanies gameplays seems like it comes from an old film from the fifties. It's so catchy that humming it throughout the day seems to become a habit. response.headline: Bonuses and Free Spins
response.content:
If you're a fan of bonuses and free spins (and let's face it, who isn't?), then you're in for a treat with Book of Time. This clever little slot game has a range of different bonuses that'll boost your chances of making some truly fabulous wins.

First up, let's talk about the book. As the game's Wild/Scatter symbol, it's a real game-changer. It replaces all paying symbols, and if it appears at least three times during the same game, it awards between 10 and 20 free spins. That's right - up to 20 free spins, just for landing the right symbol.

But it gets better. Before the bonus game starts, a special symbol is selected. If this symbol lands on at least three reels during the bonus round, it expands - giving you even more chances to win big.

And if that's not enough for you, there's also the clock - another Scatter symbol that awards ten free spins. On reels 2, 3, and 4, you'll see clocks with hands that change with each spin. Depending on the time shown, you'll get a multiplier. Time travel AND extra winnings? That's what we call a win-win.

Finally, each clock symbol that lands on the reels will cover the function of a Wild, expanding over the entire reel. We're not sure what that means in scientific terms, but we do know that it's a good thing.

So if you like your bonuses to be big, bold, and plentiful, then Book of Time is the game for you. Just don't forget to set your own clock - you might lose track of time when you're having this much fun!

faq.question: What is Book of Time?
faq.answer: Book of Time is a slot game from Hawksaw Gaming with memorable characters and comic book graphics.

faq.question: What is the maximum win in Book of Time?
faq.answer: The maximum win in Book of Time is 10,000 times the bet amount.

faq.question: What are the reel accelerators in Book of Time?
faq.answer: The reel accelerators in Book of Time are Turbo and Super Turbo.

faq.question: What is the volatility of Book of Time?
faq.answer: The volatility of Book of Time is high.

faq.question: What is the RTP of Book of Time?
faq.answer: The RTP of Book of Time is 96.13%.

faq.question: What symbols are in the base game of Book of Time?
faq.answer: In the base game of Book of Time, there are playing cards, magic wands, witch hats, daggers, hands, and mice symbols.

faq.question: What is the Wild/Scatter symbol in Book of Time?
faq.answer: The book is the Wild/Scatter symbol in Book of Time, replacing all paying symbols and triggering free spins.

faq.question: What is the clock symbol in Book of Time?
faq.answer: The clock is another Scatter symbol in Book of Time, triggering free spins and providing multipliers and expanding Wilds.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Book of Time".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Book of Time
A Pleasant Return
Some slot games are remembered over the years for their graphics, others for their gameplay, and still others for their high RTP. Then there are those that leave a lasting impression on the memory due to their memorable characters, as is the case with Book of Time, the new slot game from Hawksaw Gaming featuring Canny the Can, the cheerful yellow can previously seen in two other online games.
In this case, the graphics immediately capture the player's attention, with our friendly companion located on the right-hand side of the grid controlling our plays. The style is that of comic books, as can be seen from the font used to write the words that inform us of the amount of our winnings or the type of bonus activated.
The background is a forest, with the grid framed in wood and the buttons, well arranged at the bottom, not taking up too much space. The colors are intentionally faded, giving the game a retro taste, a feature accentuated by the music that accompanies our plays, which seems to come from an old film from the fifties.

A Great RTP for High-Level Winnings
The game grid has five reels and four rows, with 20 fixed paylines. Book of Time bets start at a minimum of €0.10 but can be increased at will. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet amount.
In addition to automatic spins, we also find two types of reel accelerators: Turbo and Super Turbo.
The volatility is high, but the RTP is 96.13%.

Different Bonuses for Fabulous Wins
Before we get into the various bonuses of this slot, let's take a look at the symbols of the base game. As in almost all games, here too we find playing cards good for a royal flush, from ten to ace, symbols that have a fairly low value. Following these, we find magic wands, witch hats, daggers, hands, and mice, each with its own symbol.
The book is a Wild/Scatter symbol, replacing all paying symbols, and if it appears at least three times during the same game, it awards from 10 to 20 free spins. Before the bonus game starts, a special symbol is selected that, if it lands on at least three reels, expands.
The clock is another Scatter symbol and awards ten free spins. On reels 2, 3, and 4, we will see clocks, whose hands change with each spin. Depending on the time shown, they will give us a multiplier. Moreover, each clock symbol that lands on the reels will cover the function of a Wild, expanding over the entire reel.

dalle-prompt.response:
Prompt: 

Create a feature image for "Book of Time" that depicts a happy Maya warrior with glasses in a cartoon style. The image should have a colorful and vibrant background highlighting the forest theme of the game. The warrior should be holding a book and a clock symbol that represents the Scatter symbols of the game. The image should convey the retro taste and comic book style of the slot game. Use warm and inviting colors along with bold outlines to give a lively and energetic feel to the image. The image should be able to catch the player's attention and convey the exciting and thrilling experience of playing "Book of Time".

Create a feature image for "Book of Time" that depicts a happy Maya warrior with glasses in a cartoon style. The image should have a colorful and vibrant background highlighting the forest theme of the game. The warrior should be holding a book and a clock symbol that represents the Scatter symbols of the game. The image should convey the retro taste and comic book style of the slot game. Use warm and inviting colors along with bold outlines to give a lively and energetic feel to the image. The image should be able to catch the player's attention and convey the exciting and thrilling experience of playing "Book of Time".
